description: Returns the details of one or more retention configurations. If the retention configuration name is not specified, this operation returns the details for all the retention configurations for that account.

parameters.name: RetentionConfigurationNames
parameters.description: A list of names of retention configurations for which you want details. If you do not specify a name, Config returns details for all the retention configurations for that account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the retention configuration object.

nested_items.name: RetentionPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: Number of days Config stores your historical information.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
